entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
